{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR2-G300N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/26/2007 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101485-0 |ic_id=6102A-013 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT1310A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=001601XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^001601[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:16:01 |oui_eth=00:16:01 |default_ch= }} OEM Gemtek WRTR-????
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=15603 On the DD-WRT forums] (images on pg. 4)
[http://www.buffalotech.com/files/downloads/WZR2-G300N_Manual_web_new.pdf Manual]
Per the manual, the default SSID may be the raw MAC address (i.e. XXXXXXXXXXXX).
